item.title: 生产力委员会主席：澳大利亚需要 "增长思维 "来实现繁荣
item.description: 澳大利亚生产力委员会主席达尼埃尔-伍德（Danielle Wood）表示，如果政府能够重拾 "增长思维"，澳大利亚的经济就能以更快的速度发展。【原文：Australia’s economy can expand at a faster pace if governments regain the “growth mindset” that has been absent from decision making for far too long, said Danielle Wood, chair of the nation’s Productivity Commission.】

Ltd.）可能刚刚在巴西开设了第一家工厂，但随着其在南美最大经济体的雄心不断膨胀，该公司已经在为第二家工厂选址。【原文：Chinese automaker Great Wall Motor Co. may have just opened its first factory in Brazil, but is already scoping out sites for a second plant as it ramps up its ambitions in South America’s largest economy.】

item.title: 中印关系改善，中国科技实力吸引印度大亨
item.description: 越来越多的印度企业正在寻求与中国公司建立技术转让合作关系，随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税大棒拉近了这对亚洲老对手的距离，这种悄无声息的努力有望得到推动。【原文：A growing wave of Indian businesses are seeking partnerships with Chinese companies for technology transfers, a quiet effort that’s expected to see a boost as President Donald Trump’s tariff barrage nudges the longstanding Asian rivals closer.】

item.title: Rightmove 称，英国房价在夏季低迷期下跌 1.1 万英镑
item.description: 英国房价比三个月前便宜了近 11,000 英镑（约合 14,900 美元），卖家们在夏季市场冷淡期争相抢购。【原文：UK home prices are almost £11,000 ($14,900) cheaper than three months ago, with sellers competing for attention during the market’s summer lull.】

item.title: 全球钢铁产能过剩拖累博思格财年收益
item.description: 由于全球钢铁产能过剩继续拖累价格，且成本上升侵蚀利润率，博思格钢铁有限公司全年基本利润下降 51%。【原文：BlueScope Steel Ltd.’s full-year underlying profit falls 51%, as a surplus of global steel capacity continued to weigh on prices and higher costs ate into margins.】

item.title: 美联储主席博斯蒂克在巡回演讲中谈及关税成本和消费者痛点
item.description: 拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）最近在亚特兰大联邦储备银行监督下对美国东南部地区进行了一次巡视，他得出了两个重要结论：消费者的压力越来越大，关税成本确实存在。【原文：Raphael Bostic had two key takeaways from a recent tour through a stretch of the southeast US overseen by the Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta — consumers are growing more stressed, and tariff costs are real.】

Also: The company’s AI and smart home road maps are revealed; Meta prepares to sell its display glasses for under $1,000; and blood-oxygen tracking returns to Apple devices in the US.】

item.description: 对专注于私募市场的二级基金的需求正在飙升，部分原因是一些投资者正在抓住一个会计上的怪圈，即允许他们以折扣价购买资产，然后再按面值重新估值。【原文：Demand for secondary funds focused on private markets is soaring, in part because some investors are seizing on an accounting quirk that allows them to buy assets at a discount and then revalue them at par.】
